Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
ComputerAI v2.0 - Enhanced Edition with system monitoring and autonomous capabilities

Major Features:
- Upgraded to Anthropic Claude API with Haiku model support
- Added comprehensive system monitoring \(CPU, RAM, disk, processes\)
- Implemented file system watcher for Desktop/Documents/Downloads
- Created autonomous action executor \(commands, files, apps, clipboard\)
- Added proactive health checks and anomaly detection
- Enhanced personality system with concise responses
- Upgraded to .NET 8.0 with Windows Forms support

New Components:
- SystemMonitor.cs: Real-time system metrics and anomaly detection
- FileSystemMonitor.cs: File change detection with event queue
- ActionExecutor.cs: System interaction and command execution
- AnthropicAI.cs: Direct HTTP API integration with Claude

Enhanced Features:
- Slash commands \(/status, /clear, /exit\)
- Context-aware AI responses with system state
- Beautiful startup banner and improved UX
- Comprehensive documentation \(README, QUICKSTART, CHANGELOG\)

Technical Improvements:
- Updated from .NET 6.0 to .NET 8.0-windows
- Added System.Management for WMI queries
- Added Performance Counter support
- Modular architecture with separation of concerns
- Improved error handling throughout

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
ComputerAI v2.5 - Sassy AI with Screen Snooping & Random Commentary

NEW FEATURES:
- Screen & Activity Monitoring: Arya now watches what you''re doing!
- Random Commentary System: Makes witty observations every 2-5 minutes
- Window/App Tracking: Knows which apps you''re using
- Clipboard History: Tracks your copy/paste behavior \(last 50 items\)
- App Usage Stats: Remembers most-used applications
- OCR Support \(Optional\): Can read text from screen with Tesseract

PERSONALITY UPGRADE:
- Much sassier and funnier responses
- Roasts the user when appropriate
- Brutally honest and sarcastic
- No more fake politeness or "let me know" nonsense
- Short, punchy, attitude-filled responses

NEW COMPONENTS:
- ScreenMonitor.cs: Screenshot capture, window tracking, optional OCR
- ActivityMonitor.cs: Activity tracking & random commentary generation
- FEATURES.md: Complete feature documentation

ENHANCED:
- AI.cs: Integrated activity monitoring and random commentary
- ActivityMonitor: Snarky observations for various scenarios
- Constants.cs: New config options for activity monitoring
- Program.cs: Added random commentary to proactive check loop

DEPENDENCIES:
- System.Drawing.Common \(10.0.2\) - Screen capture
- Tesseract \(5.2.0\) - Optional OCR support

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix action execution - Add keyword-based command detection

FIXED: Actions now actually execute instead of just responding with text

NEW: Simple keyword detection system for instant actions
- "open [app]" - Opens applications \(e.g., "open notepad"\)
- "search for [query]" / "google [query]" - Web search
- "list files" / "what files" - Lists desktop/downloads/documents files

ENHANCED:
- AI.cs: Added TryExecuteAction\(\) method for command parsing
- Sassy responses for actions: "Opening notepad." "Googling that for you."
- File listings show up to 10 files with count

BEHAVIOR:
- Action commands bypass AI and execute immediately
- Fast response time for common tasks
- Falls back to AI for non-action queries

Examples now working:
- "open notepad" → Actually opens notepad
- "what files are on my desktop" → Lists actual files
- "search for pizza" → Opens Google search

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
